title: Acropole
text: It is the heart of Acropole. An impressive temple that has lasted for millennia and that continues to amaze us with his greatness

title: Wonderful
text: A special stadium, made entirely of marble. Also here you can find the museum of the Olympiad, where you can admire the Olympic torches from the beginning

title: Do not miss
text: You cannot go to Athens without visiting the Acropolis. The experience will be unforgettable: history, romance, great views and a positive energy. The entry is cheap (10eur) and you only need a comfortable shoe.

title: Great view
text: It is a very beautiful place with a dream view. I recommend you to walk not by cable car. It is easy to reach and there are many places you can take great pictures.

title: Fascinating
text: I recomand a walk to each side of the canal but also a boat trip. This way you will have the possibility to see Canal Grande in all splendor.

title: Relaxation
text:
I visited the islands very easy and quite cheaply. I bought a 24h ticket for vaporeto and it cost 20eur/person. This way I made my own scheduel. Do not miss this tour, is very interesting and romantic. You will go back in time and understand better everything.
You can see glass factories, multicolored houses and wild nature
place: Murano, Burano & Torcello Half-Day Sightseeing Tour

title: Romantic
text: I like the place for the great view. Doesn't matter what you do, but you always see Acropolis. Here is my favorite place to eat. Good price, sufficient and varied food and also the restaurants have local muzic.

title: An extraordinary experience
text: I stay in this place 3 hours. The vibe is special and your imagination flies right away. It's not a place to be missed.

title: Relaxing
text: You can relax by going down the narrow streets of souvenir shops. Here you will find everything you want.

title: Extraordinary
text: It is a perfect way to start visiting Athen. I buy the all area ticket with 30eur. The ticket is available for many days and includes other main archaeological sites ( Hadrian's Library, Ancient Agora, Roman Agora, etc.)

title: Perfect for a walk
text: It is a big open space area, perfect for a walk to relax after a long day. I recommend you to avoid the restaurants from the middle of the principal street because the prices are high and food is bad. You can eat better on the paralel streets, only a few houndred meters on the right or on the left.

title: Not recomanded
text: This place it's look like a mall food area. Nothing special, very crowded, very noisy, bad smell, stay a lot until you find a table to eat. Don't go, it's a waste of time.

title: Perfect for pictures
text: It's an iteresting tower with elevator, from the top of wich you can admire the old center. I recommend you not to pay for elevator. Insted, you can walk 5min on the the top of the hill that is connected to the tower by a bridge. From here, you pay only 2eur to climb another 10m and reach the panoramoc platform.

title: The most interesting
text: In my opinion this is the most interesting castel. Actually, the garden is what makes it so special. Here you will discover a lot of symbols and edifices that have been part of various rituals. Pay attention to the secret doors in the rocks. One of them will take you to the initiatic fountain. This is 30m deep and you can descend the stairs that surround it. Below you will discover a series of tunnels that will lead you to many wonderful areas. Enjoy

title: Beautiful
text: It is a very beautiful castel. It look like a Disney castel, with many colors and interesting towers. You need 2h for visiting the castel and another 2h-3h for the park. Enjoi
place: Park and National Palace of Pena

title: Great view
text: It is an old fortress not a castel, pleced in the top of the hill in Alfama. From here you can see the whole of Lisbon, you can walk relaxed in the courtyard oron the hight walls.

title: Beautiful monument
text: It is a romantic place. You can see from the top all the area and make beautiful pictures. Do not skip this place.

title: The best pancakes
text: It is a beautiful, clean place and you can serve a wide range of pancakes. The service is fast and the staff very fiendly.

title: Napoletano's - Delicious food
text: If you want to eat something delicious at a good price, I recommend Napoletano's restaurant near Pantheon. Here I had the pleasure to meet Alexandru Poppov, a great person who served me and made some excellent culinary recommendations. If you get to Rome, do not miss this restaurant and do not forget to ask about Alexander. Have fun!

title: Excellent
text: It was the 4th time I visited the Vatican, but the first time I went into the museum. To find more about the exhibits I contacted the Gather's Club agency. Here I had the pleasure to meet Cristina Moldoveanu, an excellent guide, who explained to us very well and made a very pleasant tour. I recommend you contact her when you arrive in Rome. It will help you with useful information and you will save money and time. Thank you Cristina - Multumesc Cristina

title: Guide
text: The best guide for touristes is Cristina Moldoveanu. She will show and explain you everything you want to see. Thank you Cristina

title: Super
text: I made the tour with Cristina Moldoveanu, a guide from Gathers Club travel agency. She is very professional and will show and explain you everything you want to see in the museum and in Rome. Thank you Cristina.
